reqs: Pre-reqs: One of EECE 210, CPEN 221, CPSC 210, EECE 309.
description: Engineering practices for the development of non-trivial software-intensive systems including requirements specification, software architecture, implementation, verification, and maintenance. Iterative development. Recognized standards, guidelines, and models. Credit will only be granted for only one of CPSC 310, EECE 310, or CPEN 321.
